title: Fashion Trip
description: Fashion Trip is a dress-up game where you can unleash your fashionista talent for travel purposes. Customize your dolls' faces with a vast selection of facial features, hairstyles, and a wardrobe filled with dresses, tops, skirts, trousers, jackets, and more. Accessorize with scarves, necklaces, bracelets, handbags, and adorable pets. Choose iconic city backgrounds like the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben, Statue of Liberty, or Milan Cathedral, and create outfits that perfectly capture each city's vibe. With over 250 apparel items and 100+ facial features, this virtual doll salon offers endless possibilities, all completely free. Take an imaginary world tour, indulge in virtual shopping, and capture your stylish creations with screenshots to share with friends. It's time to showcase your fashion expertise and design glamorous looks fit for superstars!
